title: Get banned cause i get trolled ?
body: Today i was playing lol , after one game a message comes up and it told me that i have one warning for unspotmanslike conduit . Yes , i trolled , yes i feed , yes i flame because i see in almost every game trolls and feeders and i m sick of them , it is like a chain , someone troll me , i troll someone , but i can get ban and who trolled me escape   , is this fair Riot ? is it ? Tell me , i want to know . If you ban me riot i hope you ll ban every single troll  , feeder or flamer . I M SICK OF BEING TROLLED AND FLAMED SO I REPLAY WITH THE SAME TREATMEN . Sorry if there is ban grammar or orthography , i dont speak english very well , sorry .

replies.body: It's players that are negative consistently that end up getting punished; if you are retaliating with toxic behavior every time someone else is doing it, then of course you'll eventually get banned, and if those individuals aren't consistent with that behavior then of course they probably won't be.
So ,  i ll get permaban , yaaay

Only if you move all the way up the [4 tiers of punishment](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/yFLxpAcV-qa-about-player-behavior-systems-chat-log-reviews-and-feedback) by being consistently and/or extremely toxic. If you stop responding to toxicity with more toxicity then this won't have to happen.
